function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in home residency due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission within households","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce public health measures such as mask-wearing, ventilation, and physical distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, smart HVAC systems, UV-C disinfection","People":"Residents, household members","Owner":"Government, health authorities, building owners"},{"Description":"Remote learning in public schools","Impact":"Potential increase in energy usage during school hours","Mitigation":"Implement energy-saving practices in remote learning environments, promote energy-efficient technologies","Technologies":"Energy-efficient devices, smart lighting, remote energy management systems","People":"Students, educators, school administrators","Owner":"School districts, education authorities"},{"Description":"Shift in energy use behavior","Impact":"Higher energy consumption during traditional work and school hours","Mitigation":"Educate and encourage responsible energy use, promote energy-saving behaviors","Technologies":"Smart meters, energy monitoring systems, demand response systems","People":"Residents, household members","Owner":"Utility companies, energy providers"}]}
